General.Name: Kobexindo Tractors Tbk
General.Description: PT Kobexindo Tractors Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the distribution and servicing of heavy equipment in Indonesia. The company operates through Heavy Equipment, Spare Parts, Repair and Maintenance, and Others segments. It offers excavators, hydraulic breakers, articulated dump trucks, rigid dump trucks, heavy-duty on and off-road trucks, and wheel loaders; forklifts, hand pallets and stackers, racks, and sweeper and scrubber machines; material handling and logistics, environmental, and construction and agriculture solutions; and after sales services, as well as supplies spare parts. The company also provides repair and maintenance, and rental services for heavy equipment; and engages in the rental of building. It markets and distributes heavy equipment to mining, agriculture/plantation, forestry, and construction sectors. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in North Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Kobexindo Tractors Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Kobexindo Investama.
